prompts.daily: Viral daily horoscope for {sign} for {date}. predicting love, luck, and money. High energy, mystical tone. Under 140 words.
prompts.monthly: Viral monthly horoscope for {sign} for {date}. Cover key dates for love and career. Mystical and warning tone. Under 160 words.
prompts.yearly: Viral 2026 yearly horoscope for {sign}. A grand overview of destiny, karma, and major life changes. Mystical and epic tone. Under 200 words.
prompts.compatibility: Viral love compatibility between {sign1} and {sign2}. Focus on chemistry, tension, and long-term potential. Under 140 words.
prompts.birthday: Special birthday message for {sign} born on {date}. The spiritual significance of this solar return. Blessings and warnings. Under 140 words.
prompts.special: Viral occult or astrological secret about {topic}. Deep, mysterious, and engaging. Under 140 words.
